title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies for Ceilings; Verso: Head in Profile with Antique Helmet", 1814–18
title_raw: Decorative Studies for Ceilings; Verso: Head in Profile with Antique Helmet
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 195, 1040; Inscribed under chapel door: PIUS IIII P M.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Five studies of ceilings; door of chapel with Papal insignia of Pius IV; Verso: head with helmet, shown in profile.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Decorative Studies for Ceilings; Verso: Head in Profile with Antique Helmet", 1814–18. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2479.
